content.en: Enhanced speech quality: Specialized deep neural network-based speech enhancement systems can greatly improve the quality and intelligibility of speech. These systems use novel objective functions and perceptually motivated non-linear frequency scales to enhance the over-smoothed output features of DNN-based speech enhancement algorithms. Additionally, combining DNN with spectral phase estimation and using a hybrid approach with harmonic regeneration noise reduction can further enhance speech quality and intelligibility.
content.da: Forbedret talekvalitet: Specialiserede dybe neurale netværksbaserede taleoptimeringssystemer kan i høj grad forbedre taleens kvalitet og forståelighed. Disse systemer anvender nye objektive funktioner og perceptuelt motiverede ikke-lineære frekvensskalaer til at forbedre de overglattede outputfunktioner af DNN-baserede taleoptimeringsalgoritmer. Derudover kan kombination af DNN med spektral faseestimering og brug af en hybrid tilgang med harmonisk regenerering og støjreduktion yderligere forbedre talekvaliteten og forståeligheden.
